title: The Days of Cultivating Immortal - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Josei   Martial Arts   Mystery   Romance
author: 光月蝶衣
description:
The special soldiers went through the world of repairing immortals and became disciples of the Xiujixian family. With the addition of insertion, he began his life practicing immortality.
'Striking' to obtain the spiritual stone. 'Sign up' to get a card for strength exercises.
The 'Punch-in' mission is completed, get Heiyanjia and win the conscience card.
Check-in' is the way to cultivation.>
